workshoptitle: Streamline the analytics workflow with Autonomous Database Data Studio

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Understand data analysis requirements
tutorials.description: Look at a fictitious data analysis project for requirements

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Load demo data
tutorials.description: Load demo data for the Data Studio overview workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Transform and prepare data
tutorials.description: Use Data Transforms to transform and prepare data

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Analyze data
tutorials.description: Use Data Analysis to analyze data

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Explore data insights
tutorials.description: Use Data Insight to find hidden patterns

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Wrap up
tutorials.description: Wrap up and clean demo data

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
